name: Roger
text: Hey, my name is Roger! Have you seen my Wife?

name: Roger
text: I'm late for our flight and I can't find her

name: Roger
text: Ohhh mannnn, I don't know where she is...

name: You
text: What's her name... Maybe I've seen her.

name: You
text: You still havent told me a name...

name: Roger
text: Her name is Rose. She's blonde and is wearing pink

name: You
text: If I see her ill let her know you were looking

name: You
text: Have you checked the terminal you were supposed to be in yet?

name: Roger
text: No, she said she'd meet me back here

name: Roger
text: I guess were not going to Bora Bora this year...
